00021 #include "OgreOggSoundPlugin.h"
00022 
00023 using namespace Ogre;
00024 using namespace OgreOggSound;
00025 
00026 const String sPluginName = "OgreOggSound";
00027 
00028 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 OgreOggSoundPlugin::OgreOggSoundPlugin()
00030         :mOgreOggSoundFactory(0)
00031 {
00032 
00033 }
00034 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 const String& OgreOggSoundPlugin::getName() const
00036 {
00037         return sPluginName;
00038 }
00039 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 void OgreOggSoundPlugin::install()
00041 {
00042         // Create new factory
00043         mOgreOggSoundFactory = OGRE_NEW_T(OgreOggSoundFactory, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)();
00044 
00045         // Register
00046         Root::getSingleton().addMovableObjectFactory(mOgreOggSoundFactory, true);
00047 }
00048 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 void OgreOggSoundPlugin::initialise()
00050 {
00051         //initialise OgreOggSoundManager here
00052         mOgreOggSoundManager = OGRE_NEW_T(OgreOggSoundManager, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)();
00053 }
00054 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 void OgreOggSoundPlugin::shutdown()
00056 {
00057         // shutdown OgreOggSoundManager here
00058         OGRE_DELETE_T(mOgreOggSoundManager, OgreOggSoundManager, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GEOMETRY);
00059         mOgreOggSoundManager = 0;
00060 }
00061 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 void OgreOggSoundPlugin::uninstall()
00063 {
00064         // unregister
00065         Root::getSingleton().removeMovableObjectFactory(mOgreOggSoundFactory);
00066 
00067         OGRE_DELETE_T(mOgreOggSoundFactory, OgreOggSoundFactory, Ogre::MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL);
00068         mOgreOggSoundFactory = 0;
00069 }
